item.title: bitfields
item.description: FontMask The bits in a #PangoFontMask correspond to fields in a #PangoFontDescription that have been set. PangoFontMask PANGO_FONT_MASK_FAMILY 1 the font family is specified. PANGO_FONT_MASK_STYLE 2 the font style is specified. PANGO_FONT_MASK_VARIANT 4 the font variant is specified. PANGO_FONT_MASK_WEIGHT 8 the font weight is specified. PANGO_FONT_MASK_STRETCH 16 the font stretch is specified. PANGO_FONT_MASK_SIZE 32 the font size is specified.

item.title: constants
item.description: ANALYSIS_FLAG_CENTERED_BASELINE Whether the segment should be shifted to center around the baseline. Used in vertical writing directions mostly. PANGO_ANALYSIS_FLAG_CENTERED_BASELINE since 1.16 ANALYSIS_FLAG_IS_ELLIPSIS This flag is used to mark runs that hold ellipsized text, in an ellipsized layout. PANGO_ANALYSIS_FLAG_IS_ELLIPSIS since 1.36.7 ATTR_INDEX_FROM_TEXT_BEGINNING This value can be used to set the start_index member of a #PangoAttribute such that the attribute covers from the beginning of the text. PANGO_ATTR_INDEX_FROM_TEXT_BEGINNING since 1.24

item.title: enums
item.description: Alignment A #PangoAlignment describes how to align the lines of a #PangoLayout within the available space. If the #PangoLayout is set to justify using pango_layout_set_justify(), this only has effect for partial lines. PangoAlignment PANGO_ALIGN_LEFT 0 Put all available space on the right PANGO_ALIGN_CENTER 1 Center the line within the available space PANGO_ALIGN_RIGHT 2 Put all available space on the left AttrType
